_sText:
This is in my opinion, my best map yet. You start off very high up. Shoot the ground, it breaks. You fall and have three options. land on a platform, grab an awp and snipe. Or land on the middle platform and grab a gun there. Or go through the tunnels and through the teleporting labarynth. In the labaryth there is a chamber of many guns. Don't worry, when you hit the ground you simply get teleported back up...most of the time. And the platforms have a thin layer of water so you don't die. Have fun. The upper falling part was originally made by Nipper.

Update!!

- Added ammo for weapons
- Redid textures (more varied)
- Fixed a problem with one of the tunnels that if you fell, you would hit a ledge and take damage.

Thinking about taking away buyzones.... should I?

Update!! (lol quick)

- Fixed a ledge on the other side too.
